actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to make technical amendments to provisions relating to vocational education contained in the Education Amendments of 1976.

summary.text: Establishes maximum and minimum percentage requirements for particular uses of sums allotted to each State for vocational educational programs under the Vocational Education Act of 1963.

titles.title: A bill to make technical amendments to provisions relating to vocational education contained in the Education Amendments of 1976.
